mapper.select: SELECT sbms.sbms_user.sys_guid()
SELECT nextval('sbms.sbms_user.actseq')
SELECT setval('sbms.sbms_user.actseq',1,false)
select indt from sbms.sbms_user.bms_dct_mgmt_regi order by indt desc limit 1
SELECT setval('sbms.sbms_user.actseq2',1,false)
select indt from sbms.sbms_user.bms_dct_rdoc order by indt desc limit 1

SELECT docid as "docid" , docttl as "docttl" , indt as "indt" , authorid as "authorid" , authorname as "authorname" , authordutyname as "authordutyname" , authordeptname as "authordeptname" , state as "state" FROM sbms.sbms_user.bms_dct_rdoc WHERE (authorid = #{userid} or docid IN(SELECT docid FROM sbms.sbms_user.bms_dct_rdoc_rcvs rcvs WHERE rcvs.userid = #{userid})) and state IN('DRDS3','DRDS4')
and docid like CONCAT('%', #{docid}, '%')
and docttl like CONCAT('%', #{docttl}, '%')
and authorname like CONCAT('%', #{authorname}, '%')
and authordeptname like CONCAT('%', #{authordeptname}, '%')
ORDER BY indt DESC

SELECT A.docid, A.reportdt, A.docttl, A.gubun, B.objname, C.mgmtno, C.seclevel, STRING_AGG(E.deptname, ', ' ORDER BY E.seq ASC) AS recvdeptnames FROM sbms.sbms_user.bms_dct_rdoc A LEFT OUTER JOIN sbms.sbms_user.bms_dct_path B ON ( A.docid = B.docid ) LEFT OUTER JOIN sbms.sbms_user.bms_dct_attr C ON ( A.docid = C.docid ) LEFT OUTER JOIN sbms.sbms_user.bms_dct_rdoc D ON (A.docid = D.oridocid) INNER JOIN sbms.sbms_user.bms_dct_appr_recv E ON A.docid = E.docid WHERE A.state IN ('DRDS4') and pathorder = 1 and B.objid = #{userid} and ( A.oridocid IS NOT NULL OR D.docid IS NULL )
and A.docttl like CONCAT('%', #{docttl}, '%')
and A.authorname like CONCAT('%', #{authorname}, '%')
and E.deptname like CONCAT('%', #{recvdeptnames}, '%')
and A.reportdt >= #{startDt}
and A.reportdt <= #{endDt}
GROUP BY A.docid,C.mgmtno,C.seclevel,B.objname order by A.indt DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE sbms.sbms_user.bms_dct_path SET state = 'DCST1', mainver = '1', reportdt = null, acttype = null WHERE docid = #{docid} AND pathorder = '1'
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM sbms.sbms_user.bms_dct_path WHERE docid = #{docid} AND pathorder != '1'
mapper.update: INSERT INTO sbms.sbms_user.bms_task_infomation_temp (infomationid, resultid, infotext, inid, indt, attachid, infotype, deleteyn, infotitle) SELECT infomationid, resultid, infotext, inid, indt, attachid, infotype, deleteyn, infotitle FROM sbms.sbms_user.bms_task_infomation WHERE resultid = #{docid}
UPDATE sbms.sbms_user.bms_dct_appr_recv SET tempflag = 'Y' WHERE docid = #{docid}
UPDATE sbms.sbms_user.bms_dct_rdoc SET state = 'DRDS1', tempflag = 'Y', reportdt = null WHERE docid = #{docid}
mapper.select:
SELECT docid as "docid" , docttl as "docttl" , gubun as "gubun" , keyword as "keyword" , authorid as "authorid" , authorname as "authorname" , authordutyname as "authordutyname" , authorpositionid as "authorpositionid" , authorgradeid as "authorgradeid" , authordeptid as "authordeptid" , authordeptname as "authordeptname" , authordeptnamedesc as "authordeptnamedesc" , lastauthorid as "lastauthorid" , lastauthorname as "lastauthorname" , state as "state" , docnoseq as "docnoseq" , open as "open" , openbasis as "openbasis" , openreason as "openreason" , readrangetype as "readrangetype" , readlimittype as "readlimittype" , readlimitdate as "readlimitdate" , delflag as "delflag" , tempflag as "tempflag" , indt as "indt" , reportdt as "reportdt" , enddt as "enddt" , updt as "updt" , upid as "upid" , docfrom as "docfrom" , moveflag as "moveflag" , rcvsflag as "rcvsflag" , transflag as "transflag" , typeflag as "typeflag" , protectflag as "protectflag" , setupflag as "setupflag" , oridocid as "oridocid" , oriseq as "oriseq" , batchseq as "batchseq" , paperflag as "paperflag" , maindocflag as "maindocflag" , attachseq as "attachseq" , enfgubun as "enfgubun" , emergency as "emergency" , drmgubun as "drmgubun" , paperrecgubun as "paperrecgubun" , paperrecspecial as "paperrecspecial" , paperrectypes as "paperrectypes" , migflag as "migflag" , addsendstate as "addsendstate" , addsendcnt as "addsendcnt" , docgroup as "docgroup" , faketitle as "faketitle" , papersendflag as "papersendflag" , filelendflag as "filelendflag" FROM sbms.sbms_user.bms_dct_rdoc WHERE 1 = 1
and docid = #{docid}

SELECT docid , TO_CHAR(TO_TIMESTAMP(authgrantdt, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS') as "authgrantdt" , authseq , apprreqid , authgubun , authgoal , CASE WHEN authgrantflag = 'Y' THEN '인가' ELSE '비인가' END AS authgrantflag , TO_CHAR(TO_TIMESTAMP(authreqdt, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS') as "authreqdt" , TO_CHAR(TO_TIMESTAMP(authexpiredt, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS') as "authexpiredt" , prtdestructplandt , CASE WHEN prtdestructdt IS NOT NULL AND prtdestructdt != '' THEN TO_CHAR(TO_TIMESTAMP(prtdestructdt, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS') ELSE '' END AS prtdestructdt , reqdeptid , reqdeptname , reqid , reqname , authordeptid , authordeptname , authorid , authorname , apprdeptid , apprdeptname , apprid , apprname , CASE WHEN revokedt IS NOT NULL AND revokedt != '' THEN TO_CHAR(TO_TIMESTAMP(revokedt, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS') ELSE '' END AS revokedt , revokeid , revokename FROM sbms_user.bms_dct_auth_card WHERE docid = #{docid} ORDER BY authseq ASC

SELECT docid as "docid" , docttl as "docttl" , gubun as "gubun" , keyword as "keyword" , authorid as "authorid" , authorname as "authorname" , authordutyname as "authordutyname" , authorpositionid as "authorpositionid" , authorgradeid as "authorgradeid" , authordeptid as "authordeptid" , authordeptname as "authordeptname" , authordeptnamedesc as "authordeptnamedesc" , lastauthorid as "lastauthorid" , lastauthorname as "lastauthorname" , state as "state" , docnoseq as "docnoseq" , open as "open" , openbasis as "openbasis" , openreason as "openreason" , readrangetype as "readrangetype" , readlimittype as "readlimittype" , readlimitdate as "readlimitdate" , delflag as "delflag" , tempflag as "tempflag" , indt as "indt" , reportdt as "reportdt" , enddt as "enddt" , updt as "updt" , upid as "upid" , docfrom as "docfrom" , moveflag as "moveflag" , rcvsflag as "rcvsflag" , transflag as "transflag" , typeflag as "typeflag" , protectflag as "protectflag" , setupflag as "setupflag" , oridocid as "oridocid" , oriseq as "oriseq" , batchseq as "batchseq" , paperflag as "paperflag" , maindocflag as "maindocflag" , attachseq as "attachseq" , enfgubun as "enfgubun" , emergency as "emergency" , drmgubun as "drmgubun" , paperrecgubun as "paperrecgubun" , paperrecspecial as "paperrecspecial" , paperrectypes as "paperrectypes" , migflag as "migflag" , addsendstate as "addsendstate" , addsendcnt as "addsendcnt" , docgroup as "docgroup" , faketitle as "faketitle" , papersendflag as "papersendflag" , filelendflag as "filelendflag" FROM sbms.sbms_user.bms_dct_rdoc WHERE 1 = 1
and docid = #{docid}

WHERE 1 = 1 and docid = #{docid}

lastauthorname = #{lastauthorname},

INSERT INTO sbms.sbms_user.bms_dct_rdoc(
docid,
docttl,
gubun,
keyword,
authorid,
authorname,
authordutyname,
authorpositionid,
authorgradeid,
authordeptid,
authordeptname,
authordeptnamedesc,
lastauthorid,
lastauthorname,
state,
docnoseq,
open,
openbasis,
openreason,
readrangetype,
readlimittype,
readlimitdate,
delflag,
tempflag,
indt,
reportdt,
enddt,
updt,
upid,
docfrom,
moveflag,
rcvsflag,
transflag,
typeflag,
protectflag,
setupflag,
oridocid,
oriseq,
batchseq,
paperflag,
maindocflag,
attachseq,
enfgubun,
emergency,
drmgubun,
paperrecgubun,
paperrecspecial,
paperrectypes,
migflag,
addsendstate,
addsendcnt,
docgroup,
faketitle,
papersendflag,
filelendflag,
) VALUES(
#{docid},
#{docttl},
#{gubun},
#{keyword},
#{authorid},
#{authorname},
#{authordutyname},
#{authorpositionid},
#{authorgradeid},
#{authordeptid},
#{authordeptname},
#{authordeptnamedesc},
#{lastauthorid},
#{lastauthorname},
#{state},
#{docnoseq},
#{open},
#{openbasis},
#{openreason},
#{readrangetype},
#{readlimittype},
#{readlimitdate},
#{delflag},
#{tempflag},
#{indt},
#{reportdt},
#{enddt},
#{updt},
#{upid},
#{docfrom},
#{moveflag},
#{rcvsflag},
#{transflag},
#{typeflag},
#{protectflag},
#{setupflag},
#{oridocid},
#{oriseq},
#{batchseq},
#{paperflag},

#{attachseq},
#{enfgubun},
#{emergency},
#{drmgubun},
#{paperrecgubun},
#{paperrecspecial},
#{paperrectypes},
#{migflag},
#{addsendstate},
#{addsendcnt},
#{docgroup},
#{faketitle},
#{papersendflag},
#{filelendflag},
)
mapper.select:
SELECT distinct on (A.docid) A.docid as "docid" , A.docttl as "docttl" , A.gubun as "gubun" , A.keyword as "keyword" , A.authorid as "authorid" , A.authorname as "authorname" , A.authordutyname as "authordutyname" , A.authorpositionid as "authorpositionid" , A.authorgradeid as "authorgradeid" , A.authordeptid as "authordeptid" , A.authordeptname as "authordeptname" , A.authordeptnamedesc as "authordeptnamedesc" , A.lastauthorid as "lastauthorid" , A.lastauthorname as "lastauthorname" , A.state as "state" , A.docnoseq as "docnoseq" , A.open as "open" , A.openbasis as "openbasis" , A.openreason as "openreason" , A.readrangetype as "readrangetype" , A.readlimittype as "readlimittype" , A.readlimitdate as "readlimitdate" , A.delflag as "delflag" , A.tempflag as "tempflag" , A.indt as "indt" , A.reportdt as "reportdt" , A.enddt as "enddt" , A.updt as "updt" , A.upid as "upid" , A.docfrom as "docfrom" , A.moveflag as "moveflag" , A.rcvsflag as "rcvsflag" , A.transflag as "transflag" , A.typeflag as "typeflag" , A.protectflag as "protectflag" , A.setupflag as "setupflag" , A.oridocid as "oridocid" , A.oriseq as "oriseq" , A.batchseq as "batchseq" , A.paperflag as "paperflag" , A.maindocflag as "maindocflag" , A.attachseq as "attachseq" , A.enfgubun as "enfgubun" , A.emergency as "emergency" , A.drmgubun as "drmgubun" , A.paperrecgubun as "paperrecgubun" , A.paperrecspecial as "paperrecspecial" , A.paperrectypes as "paperrectypes" , A.migflag as "migflag" , A.addsendstate as "addsendstate" , A.addsendcnt as "addsendcnt" , A.docgroup as "docgroup" , A.faketitle as "faketitle" , A.papersendflag as "papersendflag" , A.filelendflag as "filelendflag" , B.enfdocid as "enfdocid" , B.docid as "docid" , B.relaydocid as "relaydocid" , B.receiverid as "receiverid" , B.recvdeptid as "recvdeptid" , B.doctitle as "doctitle" , B.docstatus as "docstatus" , B.apprdocnum as "apprdocnum" , B.acceptdocseq as "acceptdocseq" , B.acceptdt as "acceptdt" , B.acceptid as "acceptid" , B.acceptname as "acceptname" , B.acceptdutyname as "acceptdutyname" , B.acceptgradeid as "acceptgradeid" , B.acceptpositionid as "acceptpositionid" , B.acceptdeptid as "acceptdeptid" , B.acceptdeptname as "acceptdeptname" , B.acceptdeptnamedesc as "acceptdeptnamedesc" , B.actseq as "actseq" , B.recvdt as "recvdt" , B.distributeflag as "distributeflag" , B.setcardflag as "setcardflag" , B.shareopnflag as "shareopnflag" , B.paperdocflag as "paperdocflag" , B.paperbodyflag as "paperbodyflag" , B.attcount as "attcount" , B.relaytype as "relaytype" , B.systemtype as "systemtype" , B.convbodyflag as "convbodyflag" , B.firstreadid as "firstreadid" , B.firstreaddt as "firstreaddt" , B.inid as "inid" , B.distributedocseq as "distributedocseq" , B.distributeorgid as "distributeorgid" , B.paperappid as "paperappid" , B.paperappname as "paperappname" , B.paperappdeptname as "paperappdeptname" , B.paperappdutyname as "paperappdutyname" , B.chargerid as "chargerid" , B.chargerdeptid as "chargerdeptid" , B.distributedt as "distributedt" , B.apprdocnumcode as "apprdocnumcode" , B.recordersummary as "recordersummary" , C.docid as "docid" , C.recvdeptname_old as "recvdeptnameOld" , C.viadeptname as "viadeptname" , C.recvdeptname as "recvdeptname" , C.distsdeptname as "distsdeptname" , C.distctrlflag as "distctrlflag" , C.sendhisid as "sendhisid" , E.mgmtno as "mgmtno" , E.copyno as "copyno" , E.seclevel as "seclevel" , G.receiverid as "receiverid" , G.docorder as "docorder" , G.deptid as "deptid" , G.deptname as "deptname" , G.exstatus as "exstatus" , G.extype as "extype" , G.retry as "retry" , G.errormsg as "errormsg" , G.actername as "actername" , G.acterdeptname as "acterdeptname" , G.actdt as "actdt" , H.orgname as "orgname" , I.username as "username" FROM sbms.sbms_user.bms_dct_rdoc A LEFT OUTER JOIN sbms.sbms_user.bms_dct_enf_doc B ON ( A.docid = B.docid ) LEFT OUTER JOIN sbms.sbms_user.bms_dct_enf_recv C ON ( A.docid = C.docid ) LEFT OUTER JOIN sbms.sbms_user.bms_dct_path D ON ( A.docid = D.docid ) INNER JOIN sbms.sbms_user.bms_dct_attr E ON ( A.docid = E.docid ) LEFT OUTER JOIN sbms.sbms_user.bms_dct_rdoc F ON (A.docid = F.oridocid) left outer join sbms.sbms_user.bms_dct_relay_his G on (A.docid = G.docid) left outer join sbms.sbms_user.com_organizationinfo H on (B.recvdeptid = H.orgid) LEFT OUTER JOIN sbms.sbms_user.com_userinfo I on (B.inid = I.userid) WHERE 1 = 1 and A.state IN ('DRDS8','DRDS5', 'DRDS9', 'DRDS0') and D.state = 'DCST5' and A.authorid = #{userid} and ( A.oridocid IS NOT NULL OR F.docid IS NULL )
and A.docttl like CONCAT('%', #{docttl}, '%')
and A.authorname like CONCAT('%', #{authorname}, '%')
and C.recvdeptname like CONCAT('%', #{recvdeptname}, '%')
and A.indt >= #{startDt}
and A.indt <= #{endDt}
and H.orgname like CONCAT('%', #{orgname}, '%')
order by A.docid DESC, A.indt DESC, B.enfdocid DESC
mapper.update:
UPDATE sbms.sbms_user.bms_dct_rdoc
docttl = #{docttl},
gubun = #{gubun},
keyword = #{keyword},
authorid = #{authorid},
authorname = #{authorname},
authordutyname = #{authordutyname},
authorpositionid = #{authorpositionid},
authorgradeid = #{authorgradeid},
authordeptid = #{authordeptid},
authordeptname = #{authordeptname},
authordeptnamedesc = #{authordeptnamedesc},
lastauthorid = #{lastauthorid},
lastauthorname = #{lastauthorname},
state = #{state},
docnoseq = #{docnoseq},
open = #{open},
openbasis = #{openbasis},
openreason = #{openreason},
readrangetype = #{readrangetype},
readlimittype = #{readlimittype},
readlimitdate = #{readlimitdate},
delflag = #{delflag},
tempflag = #{tempflag},
indt = #{indt},
reportdt = #{reportdt},
enddt = #{enddt},
updt = #{updt},
upid = #{upid},
docfrom = #{docfrom},
moveflag = #{moveflag},
rcvsflag = #{rcvsflag},
transflag = #{transflag},
typeflag = #{typeflag},
protectflag = #{protectflag},
setupflag = #{setupflag},
oridocid = #{oridocid},
oriseq = #{oriseq},
batchseq = #{batchseq},
paperflag = #{paperflag},
maindocflag = #{maindocflag},
attachseq = #{attachseq},
enfgubun = #{enfgubun},
emergency = #{emergency},
drmgubun = #{drmgubun},
paperrecgubun = #{paperrecgubun},
paperrecspecial = #{paperrecspecial},
paperrectypes = #{paperrectypes},
migflag = #{migflag},
addsendstate = #{addsendstate},
addsendcnt = #{addsendcnt},
docgroup = #{docgroup},
faketitle = #{faketitle},
papersendflag = #{papersendflag},
filelendflag = #{filelendflag},
WHERE 1 = 1 and docid = #{docid}
mapper.select:
SELECT a.gubun AS "gubun", a.paperrecgubun as "paperrecgubun", b.mgmtid AS "mgmtid", b.docid AS "docid", attr.mgmtno AS "mgmtno", attr.seclevel AS "seclevel", b.secttl AS "secttl", b.authorname AS "authorname", b.deptname AS "deptname", attr.copyno AS "copyno", b.indt AS "indt", b.regirecvtype AS "regirecvtype", COALESCE(TO_CHAR(TO_TIMESTAMP(q.authexpiredt, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), 'YYYY.MM.DD'), NULL) AS "readauthexpiredt", attr.docno as "docno" FROM sbms.sbms_user.bms_dct_mgmt_regi b INNER JOIN sbms.sbms_user.bms_dct_rdoc a ON b.docid = a.docid INNER JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT ON (c.docid) c.docid, c.authexpiredt FROM sbms.sbms_user.bms_dct_auth_card c WHERE c.reqid = #{userid} AND c.authgubun = '01' AND c.authgrantflag = 'Y' ) q ON b.docid = q.docid INNER JOIN sbms.sbms_user.bms_dct_attr attr ON b.docid = attr.docid WHERE b.docid IN (SELECT docid FROM sbms_user.bms_dct_rdoc_rcvs WHERE userid = #{userid}) AND a.state NOT IN ('DRDS1', 'DRDS2') AND a.authorid != #{userid} AND COALESCE(b.delflag, '') != 'Y' AND COALESCE(b.cnsrvflag , '') != 'Y'
AND (attr.copyno LIKE '%원%' OR attr.copyno IS NULL)
AND attr.copyno NOT LIKE '%원%'
and b.regirecvtype = #{regirecvtype}
and attr.seclevel = #{seclevel}
and attr.docno like CONCAT('%', #{docno}, '%')
and attr.mgmtno like CONCAT('%', #{mgmtno}, '%')
and b.secttl like CONCAT('%', #{secttl}, '%')
and attr.copyno like CONCAT('%', #{copyno}, '%')
and b.authorname like CONCAT('%', #{authorname}, '%')
and b.deptname like CONCAT('%', #{deptname}, '%')
and b.indt >= #{startDt}
and b.indt <= #{endDt}
ORDER BY (SELECT MAX(indt) FROM sbms_user.bms_dct_rdoc_rcvs WHERE docid = b.docid ) DESC

SELECT docid as "docid" , docgubun as "docgubun" , summary as "summary" FROM sbms.sbms_user.bms_dct_summary WHERE 1 = 1
and docid = #{docid}
mapper.update:
UPDATE sbms.sbms_user.bms_dct_rdoc
readrangetype = #{readrangetype},
open = #{open},
readlimittype = #{readlimittype},
transflag = #{transflag},
WHERE docid = #{docid}
mapper.select: SELECT docid , authgrantdt , authseq , apprreqid , authgubun , authgoal , authgrantflag , authreqdt , authexpiredt , prtdestructplandt , prtdestructdt , reqdeptid , reqdeptname , reqid , reqname , authordeptid , authordeptname , authorid , authorname , apprdeptid , apprdeptname , apprid , apprname , revokedt , revokeid , revokename FROM sbms_user.bms_dct_auth_card WHERE 1=1 and docid = #{docid} ORDER BY authseq ASC

authgubun = #{authgubun},
authgoal = #{authgoal},
authgrantflag = #{authgrantflag},
authreqdt = #{authreqdt},

INSERT INTO sbms_user.bms_dct_relay_his (
docid,
receiverid,
docorder,
deptid,
deptname,
refdeptid,
refdeptname,
ackreqtype,
exstatus,
indt,
title,
orgdocid,
extype,
retry,
resultxml,
errormsg,
apply,
fleid,
actername,
telephone,
acterdeptname,
systemtype,
relaytype,
"header",
actdt,
indeptid
) VALUES (
#{docid},
#{receiverid},
#{docorder},
#{deptid},
#{deptname},
#{refdeptid},
#{refdeptname},
#{ackreqtype},
#{exstatus},
#{indt},
#{title},
#{orgdocid},
#{extype},
#{retry},
#{resultxml},
#{errormsg},
#{apply},
#{fleid},
#{actername},
#{telephone},
#{acterdeptname},
#{systemtype},
#{relaytype},
#{header},
#{actdt},
#{indeptid}
) ON CONFLICT (docid, receiverid, docorder) DO UPDATE SET exstatus = #{exstatus}, retry = #{retry}, actdt = #{actdt}, extype = #{extype}, errormsg = #{errormsg}
mapper.select: SELECT docid, receiverid, docorder, deptid, deptname, refdeptid, refdeptname, ackreqtype, exstatus, indt, title, orgdocid, extype, retry, resultxml, errormsg, apply, fleid, actername, telephone, acterdeptname, systemtype, relaytype, header, actdt, indeptid FROM sbms.sbms_user.bms_dct_relay_his WHERE 1=1 and docid = #{docid} and receiverid = #{receiverid} and docorder = #{docorder} ORDER BY docid DESC
